newsitem.title: THAILAND: Nithipat limit up on talks.
newsitem.headline: Nithipat limit up on talks.

text.p: Nithipat Capital Plc surged a 10 percent limit high to 56.50 baht on reports that its talks with Bank of Thailand in acquiring a 30 percent stake in the Bangkok Bank of Commerce Plc (BBC) had progressed smoothly.

Nithipat topped the Wednesday gainers list, advancing five baht since mid-morning in an overall bearish market. Some 1.59 million of its shares worth about 89.3 million baht changed hands near the close.

Deputy central bank governor Jaroong Nukwan told a Thai newspaper on Tuesday a group of prospective Thai investors led and advised by Nithipat stood a good chance of winning government approval to buy the major stake in BBC.
A BBC spokesman told Reuters on Monday that Nithipat was negotiating with the Thai government to buy a stake in the troubled bank.
